price: Lalle waɗanda ke karãtun Littãfin Allah* kuma suka tsayar da salla, kuma suka ciyar daga abin da Muka azurta su da shi, a asirce da bayyane, sunã fãtan (sãmun) wani fatauci ne wanda bã ya yin tasgaro.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتۡلُونَ كِتَٰبَ ٱللَّهِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ سِرّٗا وَعَلَانِيَةٗ يَرۡجُونَ تِجَٰرَةٗ لَّن تَبُورَ
footnotes: * Littattafan sama a gabãnin Annabi Muhammadu tsira da aminci su tabbata a gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
